variants.Description in input context: This variant is identified in patients with Parkinson's disease.

Material used.Description: Cell lysates were prepared from HEK293 cells expressing wild-type and mutant LRRK2.

Readout description.Result Description: The NM_000177491.4:c.2555G>A variant demonstrated increased kinase activity compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with empty vector were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to determine statistical significance.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within the range of wild-type LRRK2.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity exceeding 1.5-fold that of wild-type LRRK2.
